comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "Handrolled cigars are treated in much the same manner as others, except the wrapper is rolled on, sealed and shaped by hand. Ends are cut by hand and each cigar is handled several times prior to boxing."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: I expect that this was a job that required skill and fine action on the part of the rollers? Nice shot.
